name: Eat The Banana By The Taint
name_original: Eat The Banana By The Taint
description:
*** Choices are highlighted with pink outlines! Try different paths! There's only one ending though, haha! ***

I wanted to make a game at Perth's Global Game Jam 2020! But I had to deal with PTSD bummer stuff... BUT THEN I got to hang out with my friends and had an incredible time! So I managed to make something after all! I hope you'll enjoy it.

Special thanks to Cade and Matt for putting me together that night.
